MainPage.5: While you are away you might miss important posts from your friends.
MainPage.8: I tried Eldorado's Ketchup from Willy's. That's the STUFF! @Delzar
MainPage.9: I went into a bookstore and asked where the self-help section was. Got the answer: 'If I knew that I would not be here.'
MainPage.10: Got a letter from my vacuum cleaner today. It just wanted to let me know that our meetings under the bed has been superb.
MainPage.11: I broke my phone, so I had to spend time with my family. They seem like nice people.
MainPage.12: Why did the maths book take an umbrella to school? Because it was split in two!
MainPage.13: Got an email from a Nigerian prince who wanted to share his heritage. I sent him my bank details, still waiting....
MainPage.14: I ordered a pizza online and attatched a message: 'Can you draw a unicorn on the box?' The pizza guy delivered, and now I am a regular
MainPage.15: Unbelievable! I bought a king's crown and when I got home the box was empty...WTF!!
MainPage.16: I tried to write a book about wireless technology. I had trouble connecting to the plot.
